TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler(object sender, WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler(sender As Object, e As WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs)
public delegate void WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示处理 对象的 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件添加到 Web 部件区域之前引发事件。The event is raised before a Web Parts control is added to a Web Parts zone. 你可以指定控件可以通过自定义如何处理此事件添加到区域的 Web 部件。You can specify which Web Parts controls can be added to a zone by customizing how the event is handled. 中指定的方法时，将调用委托引发事件。The method specified in the delegate is called when an event is raised. 页开发人员可以通过添加为 Web 部件事件提供自定义处理程序`OnAuthorizeWebPart`属性设为``页上，并将自定义的方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can provide custom handlers for Web Parts events by adding an `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 此外可以以编程方式分配自定义处理程序。A custom handler can also be assigned programmatically. 有关以编程方式将分配一个事件处理程序的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 连接事件处理程序方法与事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc)。For more information on programmatically assigning an event handler, see [NIB: How to: Connect Event Handler Methods to Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/348e9600-22e3-49a2-8864-11c5bb3e98fc).
